00039 class KVIRC_API KviKvsScriptAddon : public KviHeapObject
00040 {
00041         friend class KviKvsScriptAddonManager;
00042 protected:
00043         KviKvsScriptAddon();
00044         KviKvsScriptAddon(
00045                         const QString &szName,
00046                         const QString &szVersion,
00047                         const QString &szVisibleNameCode,
00048                         const QString &szDescriptionCode,
00049                         const QString &szUninstallCallbackCode,
00050                         const QString &szIconId
00051                 );
00052 public:
00053         KviKvsScriptAddon(const KviKvsScriptAddon &a);
00054 public: // KviDict wants that... how to restrict the deletion to KviKvsScriptAddonManager only ?
00055         ~KviKvsScriptAddon();
00056 protected:
00057         QString        m_szName;              // the short name of the addon
00058         QString        m_szVersion;           // x.y.z
00059         KviKvsScript * m_pVisibleNameScript;  // the visible name, possibly translated
00060         KviKvsScript * m_pDescriptionScript;  // the description, possibly translated
00061         KviKvsScript * m_pUninstallCallback;  // uninstall callback
00062         KviKvsScript * m_pConfigureCallback;  // configure callback
00063         KviKvsScript * m_pHelpCallback;       // help callback
00064         QString        m_szDescription;       // parsed description
00065         QString        m_szVisibleName;       // parsed visible name
00066         QString        m_szIconId;            // the id of the associated icon
00067         QStringList    m_lInstalledFiles;     // the list of the installed files
00068 public:
00069         const QStringList &installedFiles() const { return m_lInstalledFiles; };
00070         const QString &name() const { return m_szName; };
00071         const QString &version() const { return m_szVersion; };
00072         const QString &visibleName();
00073         const QString &description();
00074         const QString &visibleNameCode();
00075         const QString &descriptionCode();
00076         const QString &uninstallCallbackCode();
00077         const QString &configureCallbackCode();
00078         const QString &helpCallbackCode();
00079         const QString &iconId(){ return m_szIconId; };
00080         QPixmap * icon();
00085         void addInstalledFile(const QString &szFileName);
00086         void setConfigureCallback(const QString &szConfigureCallbackCode);
00087         void setHelpCallback(const QString &szHelpCallbackCode);
00088         void executeConfigureCallback(KviWindow * pWnd);
00089         void executeHelpCallback(KviWindow * pWnd);
00090 protected:
00091         bool load(KviConfigurationFile * cfg,const QString &szName);
00092         void save(KviConfigurationFile * cfg);
00093         void executeUninstallCallback(KviWindow * pWnd);
00094         // this assumes that the script pointers are clean (i.e. not needing to be freed!)
00095         void allocateScripts(const QString &sVisibleNameCode,const QString &szDescriptionCode,const QString &szUninstallCallbackCode);
00096 };

00098 class KVIRC_API KviKvsScriptAddonRegistrationData
00099 {
00100 public:
00101         QString szName;                      // the addon name
00102         QString szVersion;                   // the addon version in form x.y.z
00103         QString szVisibleNameScript;         // the code that evaluates to the visible name, possibly translated
00104         QString szDescriptionScript;         // the code that evaluates to the description, possibly translated
00105         QString szUninstallCallbackScript;   // the uninstall callback code, will be executed at uninstallation
00106         QString szIconId;                    // the icon identifier (scaled to 32x32 atm)
00107 };

00110 {
00111 public:
00112         KviKvsScriptAddonManager();

00118         bool                               m_bLoaded;     // have we loaded stuff from disk yet ?
00119         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsScriptAddon>         * m_pAddonDict;  // all the registered addons
00120 public:
00121         static KviKvsScriptAddonManager * instance(){ return m_pInstance; };
00122         static void init(); // called by KviKvs::init()
00123         static void done(); // called by KviKvs::done()
00124
